abstract.shortdesc: A detail overview of software license agreements and authorizations.

section.title: Overview
section.p: All software from HPE is provided according to license restrictions. The HPE End User License Agreement (“EULA”) governs the use of HPE software, unless it is subject to a separate agreement between you and Hewlett Packard Enterprise and its subsidiaries. In addition to either the EULA or such separate agreement, software is subject to the Additional License Authorizations (ALAs).
This document contains information on EULA and ALA:
